#summary A JDialog with a JProgressBar

[http://petersoft-java-style-2.googlecode.com/files/JProgressBarDialog.png]

= Example =

{{{
class XXX implements JProgressBarDialogEventListener{
    ...
    void function(){
        final JProgressBarDialog d = new JProgressBarDialog(this,     "JProgressBarDialog", true);

        d.jProgressBar.setIndeterminate(true);
        d.jProgressBar.setStringPainted(true);
        d.addCancelEventListener(this);

        Thread longRunningThread = new Thread() {
        	public void run() {
        		int x = 0;
        		while (true) {
    		            d.jProgressBar.setString("processing " + x);
    		    	    x++;
    	        	}
        	}
        };
        d.thread = longRunningThread;
        d.setVisible(true);
    }

    public void cancelled() {
        // if user clicked cancel button, jump here
    }

}
